name: Tokenizing Creativity
description: I've been to multiple conferences in the pass 3 years from ETH Denver, NFT NYC, Metaverse Miami, and NFT LA. I have also hosted a handful of events with artist showcasing and educational presentations. I look forward to bringing a unique perspective as a creator and entrepreneur. As well as being open about the space, along side what it needs. I also lead a community of artist with different mediums and help integrate Blockchain technology within their projects.

speakers.name: Mr.Sazón
speakers.bio: Mr. Sazón, also known as Sazón, is a leading voice in the world of Web3 technology, with a focus on Web3 community and gaming/art. As a skilled artist and creative entrepreneur, he brings a unique perspective to his content, blending his knowledge of Web3 with his passion for gaming, art, and music!

speakers.name: Katrina Gamueda-Smith
speakers.bio: Katrina is a co-founder of PizzaDAO and has been working in the Web3 space for several years as a builder and advisor onboarding individuals and Fortune500 brands.
